Class Text2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • mgui.geometry.Shape2D
      • mgui.geometry.Text2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Shape, XMLObject

    public class Text2D
extends Shape2D
    Represents a character string with 2D geometry.
